Chicago.Academy of General Dentistry:
The Academy of General Dentistry (AGD) is a professional association of general dentists from Canada and the United States.


== Foundation and mission ==
Incorporated on August 2, 1952, the academy has grown to become the second-largest dental association in the United States, behind the American Dental Association. In accordance with its values, the academy's purpose is to advance the value and excellence of general dentistry.
